mapper.sql: agent_id, agent_name, login_name, city_id, contact_qq, contact_wechat, add_time, update_time, last_login_time, status,password
mapper.select:
select a.agent_id, a.agent_name, a.login_name, a.city_id, a.contact_qq, a.contact_wechat, a.add_time, a.update_time, a.last_login_time, a.status, a.password, a.creator_id as creatorId, b.relname as creator
from agent_info a LEFT join admin_info b on a.creator_id = b.aid where a.agent_id = #{agentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select agent_id,password,status from agent_info where login_name = #{agentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
select nextval('seq_agent_info')
insert into agent_info
agent_id,
agent_name,
login_name,
city_id,
contact_qq,
contact_wechat,
add_time,
update_time,
last_login_time,
status,
password,
creator_id,
#{agentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{agentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{contactqq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{contactWechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{creatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update agent_info
agent_name = #{agentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
login_name = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
contact_qq = #{contactqq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contact_wechat = #{contactWechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
close_reason = #{closeReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where agent_id = #{agentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
